title: bioRO
description: bioRO is a startup where the buyers can see how the goods that the sellers are offering are produced, only by scanning a QR code.

title: pearOS
description: A landing page for a Linux distro that focuses on UI and UX, offering an Mac-like experience to the user.

title: Leida
description: A simple but attractive landing page for a company that provides premium HoReCa equipment.

title: Atlis
description: Atlis is a social media platform created around the concept of communities. The landing page I created is not used in the project anymore.

title: Wedding website
description: A modern Vue app I built for my own wedding, where guests could upload photos, videos, and leave messages in a dedicated virtual space.

title: New tab
description: A custom new tab page for my personal browser. It implements a minimalist design and a few useful features.
